name: Jewel Link: Galactic Quest
summary:
It's the year 3495 and your mission is to help Captain Smith of the Starship Victory on an intergalactic adventure to save the planets! A massive explosion has rocked the entire cosmos - a gigantic star has gone supernova, unleashing unimaginable destructive force on the galaxy's citizens.

The resulting wave of wreckage now threatens the existence of the entire universe. With 3 different ways to play and power-ups to collect, use your match-3 skills to search galactic locations and help destroy the space debris before it's too late!
